item.title: INTERNATIONAL Trucks 1000 HP Engine + & 6/12/18 Speed Transmissions v1.50 ATS
item.description:
INTERNATIONAL Trucks 1000 HP Engine + & 6/12/18 Speed Transmissions v1.50 ATS

This mod is about engines and transmissions for ALL INTERNATIONAL trucks:
INTERNATIONAL LONESTAR
INTERNATIONAL LT
INTERNATIONAL 9900I

It’s more power than original Kenworth 625 hp engine.
6, 12 and 18 speed transmissions have a little bit longer gears and shifts faster.
Gears which ratios are more than 1 have maximum torque of 4800.
Gears which ratios are smaller or equal to 1 (final 2 or 3 gears) have maximum torque of 5000 and have more power from 1900 rpm.
ENGINES should be used on three or more axle trucks, because they have more grip and weight at the rear part of the trucks.
Two axle trucks are slipping too much with traction control turned off.
Trucks can do 200+ km/h (120+ mph).

Prices:
Engine: €1,000
6 speed dct Mario: €600
12 speed dct Mario: €1,200
You can unlock them at level 1

Engine DATA:
Name: 1000 HP Mario
Power: 1,000 HP (735 kw)
Torque: 3540 lb-ft (4800 Nm) at 1300 – 1500 rpm
Redline: 2600 rpm
Idling RPM: 550 rpm
Adblue off

Transmissions DATA:
6 speed:
Name: 6 speed DCT Mario
Shift time: 200ms
Differential ratio: 4.05
Gears: 6 speed
Crawls: 0
Retarder: 6

12 speed:
Name: 12 speed DCT Mario
Shift time: 200ms
Differential ratio: 3.08
Gears: 12 speed
Crawls: 0
Retarder: 6

18 speed:
Name: 18 speed DCT Mario
Shift time: 200ms
Differential ratio: 3.08
Gears: 12 speed
Crawls: 6
Retarder: 6



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Improved Headlight for SCS Trucks 1.50 ATS
item.description:
Improved Headlight for SCS Trucks 1.50 ATS

The modification replaces the default halogen light with a softer led one, while the lighting system did not change – all edits were made by adjusting the color parameters and the glare / light range. All lightmasks are default, so performance will not suffer.
You don’t need to buy a new truck for the changes to take effect.
Compatible with all default trucks



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Land Rover Defender 110 2023 L663 V1.1 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Land Rover Defender 110 2023 L663 V1.1 1.50 ETS2

CHANGELOG:
– Fixed wipers not wiping the rain drops
– Fixed multiple gaps in the interior

Specifications:
– Very high-quality exterior & interior
– Custom UI with digital speedo & partially functional misc information
– Excellent driveability
– Openable Front Windows
– Wipers work accurately
– Indicator, Wiper stalk and handbrake button animations
– Realistic engine & transmission configuration (even the 0-100, 0-200 & 0-250 kmph timings are very close compared to the real-life counterpart)
– Two interior colour options (Black & Brown)
– Four types of configuration for hood
– Four types of configuration for side-cladding
– Three types of configuration for roof
– Three types of configuration for front bumper grille
– Three types of configuration for rims
– Two types of configuration for the front grille
– Two types of configuration for A-pillar
– Two types of configuration for B-pillar
– Two types of configuration for the roof box
– Snorkel option
– Toolbox & Ladder option

FAQ:
Q: Where to purchase it?:
A: Truck Dealers > Access Mod Dealer > Land Rover



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Dodge Challenger SRT Hellcat Widebody 2018 V1.9 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Dodge Challenger SRT Hellcat Widebody 2018 V1.9 1.50 ETS2

CHANGELOG:
– Minor edits and fixes
– Improved physics

Specifications:
– Custom UI with functional digital speedometer
– Openable Front Windows
– Wipers work accurately
– Indicator stalk and headlight switch animations
– Can be attached with a compatible trailer (Caravan included as a standard offering)
– Realistic engine & transmission configuration (even the 0-100, 0-200 & 0-250 kmph timings are very close compared to the real-life counterpart)
– High-quality exterior & interior

*To achieve the top speed, slot the car into the 6th gear*

FAQ:
Q: Where to purchase it?:
A: Truck Dealers > Access Mod Dealer > Dodge

Q: Car is difficult to handle at corners
A: While taking corners, release the accelerator. That’s typical even when you drive a high-powered RWD rear-engined car in real-life



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: MAN F2000 Evo v1.1.6 ETS2
item.description:

Standalone
– Cabin: Sleeper Cab, Cab Hight Roof
– Chassis: 4×2, 6×2/4, 6×2, 6×4, 8×2, 8×4
